name: 林懷恩
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。精密量測學概論、長度量測、角度量測、幾何誤差量測（含直線度、平行度、垂直度、真圓度、平面度）、溫度量測、力、力矩和應變量測、加速度、速度量測、齒輪檢測儀、三次元座標量測、工具機檢測、微奈米量測、半導體元件量測。
Metrology Introduction, distance measurements, angular measurements, measurement of geometrical tolerance (straightness, parallelism, squareness, roundness, flatness, etc.), temperature measurements, force, torque and strain measurement, Velocity/Speed Measurement, gear measurements, CMM measurement, machine tool metrology, Micro- and Nano-scale measurement, Metrology for semiconductor devices.
schedule:
第 1 週
02/19	課程內容及教學實驗方法簡介 Introduction of the subject
第 2 週
02/26	精度理論：量測精度理論、不確定度、公差
Precision Theory
第 3 週
03/04	長度量測：量測方法與量具介紹
Precision length and distance measurement
第 4 週
03/11	精度理論與長度量測課程回顧
Review of precision Theory & length and distance measurement
第 5 週
03/18	角度量測
Precision angle measurement
第 6 週
02/25	直度、平坦度之誤差分析方法
Precision straightness and flatness measurement
第 7 週
04/01	表面輪廓及表面粗度量測：輪廓量測儀原理粗糙度量測儀原理
Surface profile and roughness measurement
第 8 週
04/08	期中考 Middle examination
第 9 週
04/15	螺紋與齒輪檢測
Screw thread and gear measurement
第 10 週
04/22	限界量規
Gauge measurement
第 11 週
04/29	螺紋、齒輪檢測與限界量規課程回顧
Review of screw thread, gear and gauge measurement
第 12 週
05/06	光學儀器量測技術：雷射干涉儀、雷射掃瞄儀、光學投影儀、雷射三角法
Optical measuring instruments and principles
第 13 週
05/13	基礎量具實務練習
Practical exercises of basic measuring tools
第 14 週
05/20	量測工具機械實務
Practical exercises of measuring Tools and Machinery
第 15 週
05/27	量測工具機械實務
Practical exercises of measuring Tools and Machinery
第 16 週
06/03	鐵道產業精密量測實務
Precision measurement practice in railway industry
第 17 週
06/10	端午節 Dragon Boat Festival
第 18 週
06/17	期末分組報告
scorePolicy:
1.	Participation 出席成績 (20%) 
2.	Group report 實習分組報告 (20%), 
3.	PBL 學習表現及回饋 (30%)
4.	Middle examination 期中考 (30%)
materials:
1.	精密量測，范光照、張郭益，高立書局，2005.
2.	Metrology for Engineers, J.F.W. Galyer and C.R. Shotbolt, Cassell Publisher Ltd. 1993.
